Hi


I have downloaded obj model with its
- Model in obj format
- Diffuse, normal and spec map in tga formats
- a .mtl file.




i am able to convert model into rad file using  obj2rad command.


example : obj2rad house.obj > house.rad




A)
but i suppose the texture is not attached and need to be incorporated in its converted rad file.


is there any way, while conversion from obj to rad,  texture description is also incorporated in the rad file?


How can i incorporate texture file. ?




B) the rad file gives the triangle details after conversion. If i want to move entire model at specific position of the scene, is there any group operation possible. ? 






Regards Brajesh
